documents.document:
HUG

EVERYBODY NEEDS A HUG

No matter who you are, you need one
no matter what you do, you want one
No matter if you are uptight or smug
everybody needs a hug

Even if you are up or even if you’re down
even if you’re flat on the ground
Even if you feel like you’ve got some kind of bug
everybody needs a hug

Maybe you’re a millionaire
or maybe you have no underwear
Maybe your life sucks and your beer is full of suds
maybe you just need some hugs

When you can’t seem to get around
when you have to look up to see down
When all you have to eat is one small spud
sounds like it’s time for a hug

If you’ve been dragged over the coals
if life is taking it’s toll
If you’re being chased by a thug
just open your arms and give him a hug

Sometimes people are very rude
just because they’re in a bad mood
You should get up close and snug
Then reach out and give their ass a hug

When everyday all you see is bad omens
when life keeps feeding you lemons
When for the things you are owed, you never get paid
Just give a hug and say it's all paid........

respect

RESPECT people's feeling!!!! Even if it doesn't mean anything to u, it could mean everything to them.......!!!!!!!!

occupy

Never get tired of doing little thing for others........
Sometimes those little thing OCCUPY the biggest part of thier heart !!!!!!!!.......

love at first sight

Hello pretty,

, I do appreciate your reply ,Am American born and raised in Romania where my parents lived and worked for 37 years, . I am best described as, Friendly/ Kind, Quiet/Shy, Romantic guy, which I enjoy Cooking/Barbecuing, Listening to Music, Pool/Billiards/Darts, Reading/Writing, Sewing/Drawing, Shopping, Taking Long Walks, Traveling/Weekend Trips/Adventure Travel, My week ends are mostly spent in Movies house, Amusement Parks, Art Galleries, Beach, Live Theater, and the Museums. Also new here, because I have heard story's that it works for people, so I join.

I am looking for a woman, I could call my own, after all this years of being alone, and I would like to settle down finally. So I Need a woman who is down to earth, caring, good looking, and above all a God fearing lady and with good qualities of a nice mother, Age,Language and distance means nothing to me, all that matters to me is love and happiness.

Am hoping to hear from you ANGEL.

Thanks.
.........is this call love?.....

LOVE

Good mornix Malaysia...........to all my dearest frenz!!!
Is nice when falling in LOVE.......
Especially to be LOVE........he3
But for GOD seek never ever to LOVE someone
Really hurts when so so and go on.......do u get what i means????agree or not?
"Glad & nice to know u,happy moment we share together
Sad & sign to miss u,silent tears will be shade in our heart......"
A sincere best wishes thatz all i can say........wishing u really find someone who really LOVE u!
May GOD bless u no matter how & where u are...........xxx

hug

There's something in a simple hug
That always warms the heart;
It welcomes us back home
And makes it easier to part.
A hug is a way to share the joy
And sad times we go through,
Or just a way for friends to say
They like you 'cause you're you.
Hugs are meant for anyone
For whom we really care,
From your grandma to your neighbor,
Or a cuddly teddy bear.
A hug is an amazing thing --
It's just the perfect way
To show the love we're feeling
But can't find the words to say..............

true

Not every MAN & WOMAN on TAGGED is on here to FIND SEX !!!
There are those who are only looking for FRIENDS who will UNDERSTAND & RESPECT THEM.
If you agree repost to your friends, and to the guys on TAGGED who truly like and respect women please repost and show your support, Thanks! ............
I LOVE THIS BECAUSE IT'S SO TRUE!!!....xx

The Magic of LOVE

THE MAGIC OF LOVE
*~*~*~* ~ * ~ * ~ * ~ *
Love is like magic
And it always will be
For love still remains
Life's sweet mystery!

Love works in ways
That are wondrous and strange
And there's nothing in life
that love can not change!

Love can transform
The most common place
Into beauty and splendor
And sweetness and grace.

Love is unselfish,
Understanding and kind
For it sees with its heart
And not with its mind!

Love is the answer
That everyone seeks...
Love is the language,
That every heart speaks.

Love can't be bought,
It is priceless and free,
Love, like pure magic,
Is life's sweet mystery!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.........

frenzship

In the garden of friendship,
friends are the flowers
that always bloom sweetly for me.
No matter how simple a flower may be,
when it smiles at you,
it brings brightness and happiness to your day.
So dear are they to me -
I will never let anyone move them...

why?

I have a question for you: Have you ever wondered why so many people on our "Friends List" ask us to add them, and they never keep in contact after we accept them? Was it because they just enjoy clicking and browsing cute/ beautiful photos, looking/reading profiles or Taglines? Or just because they only want to "increase" their "friends list" on their page? After we accept them, do you also notice some never send us a thank you message, wink, luv, tags, comments or send us even a "Hello" and, what is worse, even after they see you send them winks, luv, tags, or comments, they still never say "Thanks"...........

i m yr frenz

I Am Your Friend
we are far away from eachother
But you know that I am here.
You can feel me in your heart
As you enter each new day.

I will always be there for you
I am your friend.

Someone to share the good times
As well as the bad.
I make no judgments by what you say
I just listen with my heart and
Hope to be of help in anyway I can.

I will be there for you now and forever
And always please remember .............
